messages.subject: SAMURAI ARCHIVES: Recent Updates (2/12)
messages.msgSnippet: Samurai Archives Japanese History Page. http://samurai.bigsitecity.com/ ... The Sengoku timeline has been added to, particularly the 1540 s:
messages.messageBody:
Samurai Archives Japanese History Page.
http://samurai.bigsitecity.com/
UPDATES AS OF 2-12-2001:
-----------------------


The Sengoku timeline has been added to, particularly the 1540's:
http://samurai.bigsitecity.com/time2.html

More has been added to the 'Battles' section:
http://samurai.bigsitecity.com/battles.html

The Mori Genealogy has been modified, and Chosokabe, Hosokawa 1400-
1600, and Ukita genealogies have been added to the 'Genealogies'
section:
http://samurai.bigsitecity.com/clanindex.html

Don't forget to stop by the Samurai history forum on
Delphi.com - join in the conversation, feel free to post any
questions or comments related to japanese history:
http://www.delphi.com/samuraihistory/
